titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the George Washington University bicentennial collection, 2021. RG0157
titlestmt.author: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University.

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-06-02 15:41:30 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

physdesc.physfacet: Vast majority digital files and one box.

did.abstract: George Washington University celebrated its 200th anniversary in 2021. All materials are related to that event.
did.physloc: Materials are stored off-site, and will require additional retreival time. Please contact the Special Collections Research Center for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Materials in this collection are web crawls and social media crawls, as well as video birthday tributes from the GW community. It also contains the special Bicentennial issue of the GW University Magazine.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: RG0157: George Washington University Bicentennial Collection, Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University Libraries, Washington, DC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains the digital materials created and collected during the Bicentennial.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The series is open for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials are currently restricted; contact archives@gwu.edu for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: During the Bicentennial, the official hashtag for social media was #GW200.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: During the Bicentennial year, GW contracted with the program Tribute to receive videos celebrating the 200th anniversary of GW. Individuals recorded short videos themselves and uploaded them to the Tribute system. Participants included students, staff, faculty, alumni and more.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: While the vast majority of the materials collected were digital, the small amount of print items are in series 2.
